newsitem.title: USA: USA Detergents to restate 1996 results.
newsitem.headline: USA Detergents to restate 1996 results.

text.p: USA Detergents Inc said Monday it found errors in its 1996 results and would restate those figures to show adjustments that would hurt 1996 results of operations by about $1.3 million, net of tax.

The company said it is reviewing certain additional items that could further hurt 1996 results of operations. It said such additional adjustments, if any, could affect 1996 reported revenues and expenses and possibly other figures.
The company said it would be unable to report its 1997 second quarter results until the review is completed.

The Company said because of the errors, financial debt covenants with existing lenders will have been violated. It said it will have to reclassify about $30 million of non-current debt as current liabilities in the restated 1996 financial statements.
